repnme.cdata!:
Cote d'Ivoire - Third Structural
            Adjustment Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Structural Adjustment Project
            will be the third loan in support of the Government's
            comprehensive program of structural adjustment. In order to
            achieve its objectives, detailed action programs will be
            implemented, consisting of: (i) the improvement of
            macro-economic management and policy making within an
            established medium-term framework; (ii) restructuring
            current expenditures in line with the requirements of the
            above program and improving public investment programming
            with respect to size, composition and project portfolio;
            (iii) continuing the rehabilitation of the para-public
            sector; (iv) increasing domestic saving mobilization and
            improving financial intermediation; (v) intensifying the
            adjustment program in agriculture; (vi) generalizing
            incentive reforms in the manufacturing sector; and (vii)
            improving energy sector policies and efficiency. In addition
            the foreign exchange provided by this loan will be used to
            finance essential imports.
